00143 static void pm_set_osc0_mode(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int mode)
00144 {
00145   // Read
00146   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0_t u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0 = {pm->oscctrl0};
00147   // Modify
00148   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0.OSCCTRL0.mode = mode;
00149   // Write
00150   pm->oscctrl0 = u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0.oscctrl0;
00151 }
00152 
00153 
00154 void pm_enable_osc0_ext_clock(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00155 {
00156   pm_set_osc0_mode(pm, AVR32_PM_OSCCTRL0_MODE_EXT_CLOCK);
00157 }
00158 
00159 
00160 void pm_enable_osc0_crystal(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int fosc0)
00161 {
00162   pm_set_osc0_mode(pm, (fosc0 < 8000000) ? AVR32_PM_OSCCTRL0_MODE_CRYSTAL_G2 :
00163                                            AVR32_PM_OSCCTRL0_MODE_CRYSTAL_G3);
00164 }
00165 
00166 
00167 void pm_enable_clk0(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int startup)
00168 {
00169   pm_enable_clk0_no_wait(pm, startup);
00170   pm_wait_for_clk0_ready(pm);
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 void pm_disable_clk0(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00175 {
00176   pm->mcctrl &= ~AVR32_PM_MCCTRL_OSC0EN_MASK;
00177 }
00178 
00179 
00180 void pm_enable_clk0_no_wait(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int startup)
00181 {
00182   // Read register
00183   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0_t u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0 = {pm->oscctrl0};
00184   // Modify
00185   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0.OSCCTRL0.startup = startup;
00186   // Write back
00187   pm->oscctrl0 = u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0.oscctrl0;
00188 
00189   pm->mcctrl |= AVR32_PM_MCCTRL_OSC0EN_MASK;
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00193 void pm_wait_for_clk0_ready(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00194 {
00195   while (!(pm->poscsr & AVR32_PM_POSCSR_OSC0RDY_MASK));
00196 }

00282 void pm_enable_osc32_crystal(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00283 {

00285 }

00288 void pm_enable_clk32(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int startup)
00289 {
00290   pm_enable_clk32_no_wait(pm, startup);
00291   pm_wait_for_clk32_ready(pm);
00292 }
00293 
00294 
00295 void pm_disable_clk32(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00296 {
00297   pm->oscctrl32 &= ~AVR32_PM_OSCCTRL32_OSC32EN_MASK;
00298 }
00299 
00300 
00301 void pm_enable_clk32_no_wait(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int startup)
00302 {
00303   // Read register
00304   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl32_t u_avr32_pm_oscctrl32 = {pm->oscctrl32};
00305   // Modify
00306   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl32.OSCCTRL32.osc32en = 1;
00307   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl32.OSCCTRL32.startup = startup;
00308   // Write back
00309   pm->oscctrl32 = u_avr32_pm_oscctrl32.oscctrl32;
00310 }
00311 
00312 
00313 void pm_wait_for_clk32_ready(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00314 {
00315   while (!(pm->poscsr & AVR32_PM_POSCSR_OSC32RDY_MASK));
00316 }
00317 
00318 
00319 void pm_cksel(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00320               unsigned int pbadiv,
00321               unsigned int pbasel,
00322               unsigned int pbbdiv,
00323               unsigned int pbbsel,
00324               unsigned int hsbdiv,
00325               unsigned int hsbsel)
00326 {
00327   u_avr32_pm_cksel_t u_avr32_pm_cksel = {0};
00328 
00329   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.cpusel = hsbsel;
00330   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.cpudiv = hsbdiv;
00331   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.hsbsel = hsbsel;
00332   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.hsbdiv = hsbdiv;
00333   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.pbasel = pbasel;
00334   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.pbadiv = pbadiv;
00335   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.pbbsel = pbbsel;
00336   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.pbbdiv = pbbdiv;
00337 
00338   pm->cksel = u_avr32_pm_cksel.cksel;
00339 
00340   // Wait for ckrdy bit and then clear it
00341   while (!(pm->poscsr & AVR32_PM_POSCSR_CKRDY_MASK));
00342 }
00343 
00344 
00345 void pm_gc_setup(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00346                   unsigned int gc,
00347                   unsigned int osc_or_pll, // Use Osc (=0) or PLL (=1)
00348                   unsigned int pll_osc, // Sel Osc0/PLL0 or Osc1/PLL1
00349                   unsigned int diven,
00350                   unsigned int div)
00351 {
00352   u_avr32_pm_gcctrl_t u_avr32_pm_gcctrl = {0};
00353 
00354   u_avr32_pm_gcctrl.GCCTRL.oscsel = pll_osc;
00355   u_avr32_pm_gcctrl.GCCTRL.pllsel = osc_or_pll;
00356   u_avr32_pm_gcctrl.GCCTRL.diven  = diven;
00357   u_avr32_pm_gcctrl.GCCTRL.div    = div;
00358 
00359   pm->gcctrl[gc] = u_avr32_pm_gcctrl.gcctrl;
00360 }
00361 
00362 
00363 void pm_gc_enable(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00364                   unsigned int gc)
00365 {
00366   pm->gcctrl[gc] |= AVR32_PM_GCCTRL_CEN_MASK;
00367 }
00368 
00369 
00370 void pm_gc_disable(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00371                    unsigned int gc)
00372 {
00373   pm->gcctrl[gc] &= ~AVR32_PM_GCCTRL_CEN_MASK;
00374 }
00375 
00376 
00377 void pm_pll_setup(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00378                   unsigned int pll,
00379                   unsigned int mul,
00380                   unsigned int div,
00381                   unsigned int osc,
00382                   unsigned int lockcount)
00383 {
00384   u_avr32_pm_pll_t u_avr32_pm_pll = {0};
00385 
00386   u_avr32_pm_pll.PLL.pllosc   = osc;
00387   u_avr32_pm_pll.PLL.plldiv   = div;
00388   u_avr32_pm_pll.PLL.pllmul   = mul;
00389   u_avr32_pm_pll.PLL.pllcount = lockcount;
00390 
00391   pm->pll[pll] = u_avr32_pm_pll.pll;
00392 }
00393 
00394 
00395 void pm_pll_set_option(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00396                        unsigned int pll,
00397                        unsigned int pll_freq,
00398                        unsigned int pll_div2,
00399                        unsigned int pll_wbwdisable)
00400 {
00401   u_avr32_pm_pll_t u_avr32_pm_pll = {pm->pll[pll]};
00402   u_avr32_pm_pll.PLL.pllopt = pll_freq | (pll_div2 << 1) | (pll_wbwdisable << 2);
00403   pm->pll[pll] = u_avr32_pm_pll.pll;
00404 }
00405 
00406 
00407 unsigned int pm_pll_get_option(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00408                                unsigned int pll)
00409 {
00410   return (pm->pll[pll] & AVR32_PM_PLLOPT_MASK) >> AVR32_PM_PLLOPT_OFFSET;
00411 }
00412 
00413 
00414 void pm_pll_enable(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00415                   unsigned int pll)
00416 {
00417   pm->pll[pll] |= AVR32_PM_PLLEN_MASK;
00418 }
00419 
00420 
00421 void pm_pll_disable(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00422                   unsigned int pll)
00423 {
00424   pm->pll[pll] &= ~AVR32_PM_PLLEN_MASK;
00425 }
00426 
00427 
00428 void pm_wait_for_pll0_locked(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00429 {
00430   while (!(pm->poscsr & AVR32_PM_POSCSR_LOCK0_MASK));
00431 
00432   // Bypass the lock signal of the PLL
00433   pm->pll[0] |= AVR32_PM_PLL0_PLLBPL_MASK;
00434 }
00435 
00436 
00437 void pm_wait_for_pll1_locked(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00438 {
00439   while (!(pm->poscsr & AVR32_PM_POSCSR_LOCK1_MASK));
00440 
00441   // Bypass the lock signal of the PLL
00442   pm->pll[1] |= AVR32_PM_PLL1_PLLBPL_MASK;
00443 }
00444 
00445 
00446 void pm_switch_to_clock(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned long clock)
00447 {
00448   // Read
00449   u_avr32_pm_mcctrl_t u_avr32_pm_mcctrl = {pm->mcctrl};
00450   // Modify
00451   u_avr32_pm_mcctrl.MCCTRL.mcsel = clock;
00452   // Write back
00453   pm->mcctrl = u_avr32_pm_mcctrl.mcctrl;
00454 }
00455 
00456 
00457 void pm_switch_to_osc0(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int fosc0, unsigned int startup)
00458 {
00459   pm_enable_osc0_crystal(pm, fosc0);            // Enable the Osc0 in crystal mode
00460   pm_enable_clk0(pm, startup);                  // Crystal startup time - This parameter is critical and depends on the characteristics of the crystal
00461   pm_switch_to_clock(pm, AVR32_PM_MCSEL_OSC0);  // Then switch main clock to Osc0
00462 }

00465 void pm_bod_enable_irq(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00466 {
00467   pm->ier = AVR32_PM_IER_BODDET_MASK;
00468 }
00469 
00470 
00471 void pm_bod_disable_irq(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00472 {
00473   pm->idr = AVR32_PM_IDR_BODDET_MASK;
00474 }
00475 
00476 
00477 void pm_bod_clear_irq(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00478 {
00479   pm->icr = AVR32_PM_ICR_BODDET_MASK;
00480 }
00481 
00482 
00483 unsigned long pm_bod_get_irq_status(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00484 {
00485   return ((pm->isr & AVR32_PM_ISR_BODDET_MASK) != 0);
00486 }
00487 
00488 
00489 unsigned long pm_bod_get_irq_enable_bit(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00490 {
00491   return ((pm->imr & AVR32_PM_IMR_BODDET_MASK) != 0);
00492 }
00493 
00494 
00495 unsigned long pm_bod_get_level(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00496 {
00497   return (pm->bod & AVR32_PM_BOD_LEVEL_MASK) >> AVR32_PM_BOD_LEVEL_OFFSET;
00498 }

00501 void pm_write_gplp(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,unsigned long gplp, unsigned long value)
00502 {
00503   pm->gplp[gplp] = value;
00504 }
00505 
00506 
00507 unsigned long pm_read_gplp(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,unsigned long gplp)
00508 {
00509   return pm->gplp[gplp];
